description: The perfect healthier nibbles to munch on when hunger pangs strike, these super-easy roasted chickpeas will satisfy any snack attack.
name: Spicy Buffalo Chickpeas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Combine chickpeas, sauce and oil in a large bowl. Spread, in a single layer, on tray. Sprinkle with cayenne and paprika. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden. Set aside to cool for 10 minutes. Serve or store in an airtight container.
